caption: Figure 5: Comparison between single-stage and two-stage training strategies.
description: The chart compares the performance of single-stage and two-stage training strategies on various benchmarks, showing that the two-stage approach generally yields better results.
section: 4.5 COMPARISON BETWEEN SINGLE-STAGE AND TWO-STAGE TRAINING

caption: Figure 6: Effect of scaling up sample size.
description: The chart displays the effect of increasing the size of the MultiUI dataset on the average scores of four task categories: GUI Understanding, GUI Grounding, General OCR/Doc/Chart, and General Grounding.

caption: Figure 7: Ablation study of training on four task types.
description: The chart displays the ablation study results of training on different task types (QA, Caption, OCR, Grounding) and their combinations for four different benchmarks (VisualWebBench, ScreenSpot, DocVQA, RefCOCO+).
